Package it.polimi.ingsw.am42.view.clientModel

Class GameClientModel

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am42.view.clientModel.GameClientModel
public class GameClientModel extends Object
Class to store the simplified game model in the client The information are sent one by one with the Change messages from the server
